content:
Does rust-analyzer support workspaces with multiple crates with differing targets?
I'm having trouble configuring my rust-toolchain file to something where RA isn't complaining about missing tokio deps likely because other crates are targeting wasm. Any ideas or resources that I can look into to get this right?

It looks like I mistakenly left the following setting in my VS Code settings.

Sorry for the extra noise

  "rust-analyzer.cargo.target": "wasm32-unknown-unknown",
